newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 15.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 15.

text.p: Here are the main headlines from Lithuania's M-1 plus radio station's noon news report on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- A delegation from the Lithuanian ministry of foreign affairs has gone to Belarus to negotiate agreements on mutual investment protection and promotion.
- Parliamentary chairman Vytautas Landsbergis is in Germany today, where he will meet with German leader Helmut Kohl.
- Gas prices at stations in Vilnius rose on Tuesday by 15 to 23 centas per liter.
- Lithuanian energy authorities have warned dacha owners in the countryside to pay their power bills or else they will be cut off.
